name: InterCultural Group
overview:
InterCultural Group provides cross cultural consulting and training services empowering companies to go global thanks to the most formidable international business platform of all times: the Internet.

2 Billion people are online everyday; most of them are based overseas. They are your global clients, partners, and suppliers. We developed the Intercultural IntelligenceÂ® Model to help you tap into unprecedented international business opportunities in the global marketplace of the 21st century.

We work in four different languages: Italian, English, French and Spanish and we have done projects for global brands including: Costa Cruises, Electrolux, GE Healthcare, Georgetown University and Google, plus a number of amazing small businesses.

Intercultural Group has presented research and delivered training to Googleâ€˜s staff at their headquarters in Mountain View California, USA, and we are constantly investing energy and resources in innovating our programs and tools for our clients.

We can help you with:

  • Developing and Implementing a Global Business Strategy for Your Company
  • Designing Your Web Presence for Multicultural Audiences
  • Designing Social Media Campaigns for Culture Specific Target Audiences
  • Building and Leading Effective Multinational Teams
